Title: Baked Falafel Appetizer
Ingredients: 1 cup dried chickpeas, soaked in saltwater
1/4 cup each parsley and cilantro leaves
1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper and cumin each
1/4 Long English cucumber, seeded and grated
Instructions: Preheat oven to 375 F. Grease a baking sheet or oven-safe pan (cast iron) with oil.
Rinse the soaked chickpeas with cold water. Add them to a food processor with all other Falafel ingredients and pulse until combined. Form the mixture into 20 small balls and flatten.
Place on prepared pan and bake for 15-20 minutes. Flip half-way through.
Seed the cucumber and grate finely. Squeeze out extra liquid from the cucumber befo re adding to the yogurt. Grate the garlic clove and add as well.
